description:
Course Description

This 5 Days Office Yoga Challenge Part 2 is created to practice yoga at your work. It contains 5 sections and each one is actually suggestion how to adjust yoga poses to practice them at work. The idea is to incorporate yoga as your everyday habit so you will be able to feel great benefits of it.Â 

Why take this course?

Taking this course and practicing continuously, day by day, week by week, you will feel great benefits of yoga. After some time you will feel lower level of stress, better self-control, better breath rate, focus and concentration. You will see the difference but people around you, your boss and your colleagues also will. And don't forget, key to
success in yoga is consistency!
title: 5 Days Office Yoga Challenge - Part 2
